DOC.brief_title: Effects Tart Cherry Aroniaberry Supplementation Endothelial Function Cardiovascular Measures Healthy Older Adults : Interactions With Genotype Proteome
DOC.detailed_description: Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) continue lead cause death disability worldwide . Cardiovascular disease age-related onset progression . The age process cause failure protective vascular mechanism lead pathophysiological change increase risk CVD . Heart healthy strategy include consumption diet rich fruit vegetable reduce risk prevent CVD . There grow experimental evidence certain fruit berry include , cherry aroniaberries , may cardioprotective due antioxidant vasodilatory property , beneficial modulation immune function inflammation . However , limited human study examine effect . In old adult , vascular age predominantly include increased arterial stiffness endothelial dysfunction . Oxidative stress inflammation also link age process . Therefore , study investigate effect tart cherry aroniaberry supplementation endothelial function ( flow-mediated brachial artery dilation ) arterial stiffness ( cardio-ankle vascular index ) indicator cardiovascular risk atherosclerosis . These measurement also provide assessment arterial structure function . Biomarkers endothelial dysfunction , inflammation , vascular injury , oxidation , lipid , well flavonoid phenolic acid profile also examine . Importantly , role genetics environmental interaction causal factor CVD completely understand . There also limit data plasma proteome change physiological process may result intervention diet nutrient . This study explore association response tart cherry aroniaberry supplementation single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) locus relate study outcome risk CVD . Moreover , association two supplement proteomic panel plasma proteins involve several physiological pathway CVD also investigate . In randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , crossover clinical trial , 96 healthy old adult ( age 55-70 ) give tart cherry alternate aroniaberry supplementation daily 3 week usual diet . This study include initial screen visit follow 6 visit 3 week interval consist treatment , washout placebo period . This investigation provide important information role flavonoidrich nutrient effect arterial structure function . Relating genomic proteomic signature outcome study useful develop future therapeutic strategy low CVD risk .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : An Associate Investigator examine participant determine eligibility accord inclusion exclusion criterion document eligibility checklist . Men woman age 5570 year In good general health determine physical exam normal range obtain screen Postmenopausal woman ( menses within 12 month ) Normal prehypertensive blood pressure ( e.g. , SBP le equal 139 mmHg DBP le equal 89 mmHg ) Normal mild hyperlipidemia ( e.g. , TC le equal 239 , LDL less equal to159 , Triglycerides le equal 199 , HDL < 45 mg/dL ) BMI 18.5 25kg/m2 Willing ability sign consent Willing make time commitment study Individuals fluent English EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Progressive unstable know disease body system include cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , central nervous system , psychiatric , endocrine , hematologic , renal , immunologic disorder Known acute chronic inflammatory disease ( i.e . rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematous , hepatitis ) Elevated Creactive protein level ( > 3.0mg/L ) Current ( within last 3 month ) smoke tobacco product , i.e. , cigarette , pipe Abnormal Complete Metabolic Panel ( CMP ) , Complete Blood Count ( CBC ) , cholesterol panel , Thyroid Stimulating Hormone ( TSH ) , Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate ( ESR ) ( laboratory value outside acceptable reference range old adult determine clinically significant ) Indications current within last 3 year substance alcohol abuse Alcohol consumption > 1 drink/day , i.e. , 1 bottle beer , half glass wine , 1 shot hard liquor Known sensitivity allergy tart cherry aroniaberry Currently cholesterollowering , antihypertensive , thyroid , steroid hormonal medication Routine use vitamin , supplement , counter medication include aspirin , aspirincontaining product , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , i.e. , motrin , advil , aleve , unless discontinue 14 day prior first visit .
